English:
Um, excuse me? Do you have a second?
Or are you working on a case right now?
Chinese:
那個，可以打擾一下嗎……？
還是你們正在忙呢……？
Korean:
저기, 잠깐 괜찮으신가요…?
아니면 지금은 바쁘신가요…?
German:
Ähm, Entschuldigung? Hast du kurz Zeit?
Oder arbeitest du gerade an einem Fall?

English:
Do you remember me? My name is Chika Yamashina.
We spoke before about my Dad...
Chinese:
啊，不記得我了嗎？我叫山科千夏。
之前有說過爸爸的事情……
Korean:
아, 저 기억 안 나세요? 저, 야마시나 치카라고 합니다
전에 아빠 일로 얘기를 나눈 적이…
German:
Kennst du mich noch? Ich bin Chika Yamashina.
Wir hatten über meinen Papa geredet ...

Chinese: 最近，爸爸的樣子怪怪的……
German: Er verhält sich in letzter Zeit seltsam.

English:
He suddenly started mumbling things like "I was
betrayed by Kamishiro," and something about an 
accident eight years ago.
Chinese:
突然開始嘟囔：「被神代背叛了。」
又說什麼：「8年前的事故。」
Korean:
갑자기「카미시로에게 배신당했어」라든가
「8년 전의 사고」라든가 중얼중얼 혼잣말을 하기 시작해서…
German:
Plötzlich murmelt er Sachen wie „Kamishiro hat
mich verraten“ und irgendwas von einem Unfall
vor acht Jahren.

English:
They call it a state of confusion? It got so
awkward we ended up checking him in to the 
Central Hospital.
Chinese:
是叫做“精神錯亂”吧……因為他的狀況實在太異常，
最後住進了中央醫院。
Korean:
"착란 상태"라고 하는 걸까요… 너무 상태가 이상해서
결국, 센트럴 병원에 입원하게 되었어요
German:
Sie nennen es einen akuten Verwirrungszustand.
Es wurde so schlimm, dass wir ihn ins
Zentralkrankenhaus gebracht haben.

English: He was fine until the other day. Why so sudden?
Chinese: 明明之前還很正常的，為什麼會變成這樣……？
Korean: 얼마 전까지 정말 괜찮았는데, 어째서 이렇게 된 걸까요…?
German:
Bis vor Kurzem ging es ihm gut.
Warum passiert denn das so plötzlich?

English:
You were investigating him the other day, right?
Please, tell me! Is something happening to him?
Chinese:
偵探大人，前陣子你調查了爸爸，對吧？
請告訴我！爸爸到底發生了什麼事？
Korean:
탐정님, 저번에 아빠에 대해서 조사하셨었죠?
가르쳐 주세요! …아빠의 몸에 무슨 일이 일어난 건가요?
German:
Du hast dich doch neulich im Rahmen deiner
Ermittlungen mit ihm unterhalten, oder?
Bitte sag es mir! Passiert ihm gerade etwas?

English:
What? You were investigating something else?
I see... Then I guess you don't know either.
Chinese:
咦？前陣子是調查別的事情？
是這樣啊……偵探也不清楚詳細情況呢……
Korean:
에? …저번 조사는 다른 건이었다고요?
그런가요… 탐정님도 자세한 건 모르시는 거군요…
German:
Was? Es ging eigentlich um etwas anderes?
Verstehe ... Dann weißt du es wohl auch nicht.

English:
Then can I ask you to take the case?
Will you find out what's happening to my dad?
Chinese:
偵探大人，我要再次委託你！
可以幫我調查爸爸發生了什麼事情嗎？
Korean:
그럼 탐정님, 의뢰할게요!
아빠의 몸에 무슨 일이 일어난 건지, 조사해 주시지 않으실래요?
German:
Würdest du den Fall dann annehmen? Und
herausfinden, was mit meinem Papa los ist?

English:
I was too scared to learn about his past. 
I thought he'd go back to being the cold and
distant father he was before.
Chinese:
我很害怕深入了解爸爸的過去……
好像又會變回以前那個冷漠的爸爸……
Korean:
저, 아빠의 과거를 깊게 아는 게 무서웠어요…
다시 예전의 차가운 아빠로 돌아갈 것만 같아서…
German:
Ich habe vor seiner Vergangenheit Angst.
Ich dachte, er wird vielleicht wieder so kalt
und abweisend wie früher.

English:
But my family needs to know if there is something
in his past that's hurting him!
Chinese:
但如果折磨爸爸的是過去的事件，
身為家人，我覺得我必須要知道……！
Korean:
하지만, 만약 아빠를 괴롭히고 있는 게 과거의 일이라고 한다면
가족으로서, 알아야 한다고 생각해요…!
German:
Aber falls seine Vergangenheit für ihn gefährlich
ist, muss seine Familie das wissen!

English:
Thank you!
I'm counting on you... Detective.
Chinese:
謝謝！
偵探大人……你真可靠。
German:
Danke.
Ich zähle auf dich ... Detektiv!

English:
Chika's father, Makoto Yamashina, is in the
Central Hospital. Time to have a look!
Chinese:
千夏的爸爸「山科誠」似乎在「中央醫院」……
過去看看吧！
Korean:
치카의 아버지「야마시나 마코토」는「센트럴 병원」에 있는 모양이야…
가 보자!
German:
Chikas Vater Makoto Yamashina liegt im
Zentralkrankenhaus. Nichts wie hin!
